product_desc: HAP brings you the finest cold weather underwear for Men.Made with a unique combination of polyfill sandwiched between layers of combed cotton, it keep you warm and comfortable.These quilted thermals are designed to give a contoured snug fit and can be worn both as innerwear or outwear under any out fit .The snug fit keeps you insulated and warm .This Package contains a thermal top and elasticized trouser.Slim/ Body fitting to keep you warm & cosy in chilly winters Stylish deep round shaped neck-line and charcoal grey color for great look .Shaped to fit, super comfortable waistband and rib cuff at ankles for 'no sag' fit .
pd_material: Do Not Wring . Use mild detergent . Do not Bleach. Material 80% cotton 20%polyester

product_desc:
Premium blended fabric keeps you warm. Inside of the fabric brushed for feather touch softness. 3x1 interlock fabric structure for maximum stretch and snug fit. Label free comfort all day.
Key Feature:
USE: Thermal clothing are the base layers that you wear under your regular clothes. Thermal clothing also wicks sweat away to keep you from getting chilly
Premium blended fabric, Feather touch Softness, Snug Fit and Labwl free comfort
STYLE: This Thermal bottom comes with elastic waist pants. This stylish set is a perfect blend of style and comfort
MATERIAL: These thermals are carefully made from cotton rich fabric which is soft and comfortable for the skin.
Wash Care: These thermals are very easy to take care of. A regular cold machine wash and dry in shade is recommended. Do not use bleach or any coloring agents.
pd_material: The Model (height 6') is wearing a size M
pdp_name: Men Charcoal Grey Solid Thermal Top
